caller_intent: The caller requested proof of insurance (likely for a loan company) to be sent to their email address.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the ability to email a copy of the policy.
Agent asked for the caller's email address (lamocain@gmail.com).
Agent assured the caller the document would be sent shortly.
knowledge_required: Process for sending policy documents via email
Verification of email addresses for document delivery
summary: A caller requested proof of insurance via email for a loan company. The agent confirmed the request, collected the email address (lamocain@gmail.com), and agreed to send the policy document. The call concluded with both parties expressing gratitude.
